name: TI_2_1_2_3_User_Authentication__System_Prompt_for_Password_Change__Security_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.2.3 User Authentication (System Prompt for Password Change) Security Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track user authentication (system prompt for password change).
purpose: Capture user authentication (system prompt for password change), both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.3#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence of user authentication when user is prompted to change password.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.3#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.3#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.3#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.3#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.3#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.3#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.3#08
statement.requirement: IF password change successful, THEN the system SHALL capture the new password.
